div.p: Novation Agreement Modifications are used
when a new debtor corporation agrees to pay
the debts of an old debtor corporation.
These are very important modifications and, if you
have any question about the mod's applicability to
you, you should contact your Contracting Officer.
This modification allows you to inform GSA and your
assigned CO of any Novation agreements.
This scenario might mean that you will need to
replace your existing DUNs with a new one.
To begin with you will be asked if you would like
the replace the existing DUNS (on this contract.
For the purpose of this demonstration we are going
to respond Yes, and take you through the process.
Selecting Yes will reveal text boxes which allow you
to enter your new DUNS and Plus 4 number if
applicable.
Answer the Novation question and each of the
subsequent questions.
The questions asked in this section change
depending on your answer.
Go through this section, answering each question,
by selecting the appropriate yes or no
radio button.
Your answers will determine what documents
are required to upload and submit the Mod.
The questions will all focus on whether or not
you have other outstanding contracts-with GSA or
other Federal agencies-that require
novation.
The goal is to provide the CO with enough information
to determine where you are in the novation process.
When you have finished your response, click "Save
and Continue."
You will be asked to confirm that the
information appearing with your new DUNS number is
correct.
Review the new Corporate Information screen.
If there are any issues you must make corrections
on the SAM website at www.sam.gov eMod will take
24 hours for updates to be reflected in the system.
If everything is correct, click "Save and Continue."
The Description for Novation Agreement page
will appear as shown below.
Begin by noting the documents that will be
required during the "Upload Documents"
process.
These can be found next to Instructions.
The description is optional, however,
entering a brief description to provide the
CO with enough information to determine where you are
in the novation process will be helpful for your
CO When you have finished click Save and Continue.
